description: Remaining roadmap items for autonomous implementation

userStories.title: Weekly Intent Generator
acceptanceCriteria: Create scripts/generate_weekly_intent.py
Reads athletes/{name}/profile.yaml for availability and goals
Reads athletes/{name}/athlete_state.json for readiness, TSB, training phase
Outputs weekly_intent.json to athletes/{name}/
Intent includes: key_sessions_target, aerobic_volume_hours range, priority rule
Adjusts targets based on current TSB and readiness
python3 scripts/generate_weekly_intent.py matti-rowe runs without error

userStories.title: Daily Session Recommender
acceptanceCriteria: Create scripts/recommend_session.py
Reads athlete_state.json for readiness score and health gates
Checks readiness thresholds: >=70 key, 45-70 support, <45 recovery
Checks all 5 health gates - any fail blocks intensity
Outputs session type recommendation (key/support/recovery)
Suggests specific workout archetype from knowledge/archetypes/
python3 scripts/recommend_session.py matti-rowe runs without error
userStories.notes: Use existing readiness thresholds from athlete_state.json

userStories.title: Alert Engine
acceptanceCriteria: Create scripts/check_alerts.py
Monitors TSB drift: warn if < -20
Monitors ramp rate: warn if > 5 TSS/week
Monitors compliance: warn if < 70% over 7 days
Monitors zone distribution drift vs 84/6/10 target
Updates alerts.active array in athlete_state.json
Clears resolved alerts to alerts.resolved_recently
python3 scripts/check_alerts.py matti-rowe runs without error
userStories.notes: Reference existing alerts structure in athlete_state.json

userStories.title: Weekly Review Generator
acceptanceCriteria: Create scripts/weekly_review.py
Summarizes past 7 days: total TSS, hours, workouts completed
Calculates compliance percentage
Analyzes zone distribution vs 84/6/10 targets
Identifies wins (PRs, consistency, recovery) and flags (missed workouts, overreach)
Suggests adjustments for coming week
Outputs to console and optionally to weekly_review.json
python3 scripts/weekly_review.py matti-rowe runs without error
userStories.notes: Pull data from athlete_state.json recent_training section

userStories.title: Race Countdown Dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Create scripts/race_countdown.py
Shows days until A-race from profile.yaml
Calculates current CTL and trajectory to race-day target
Lists key milestones remaining (peak week, taper start, etc)
Identifies risk factors (low CTL, high fatigue, compliance issues)
Outputs formatted console dashboard
python3 scripts/race_countdown.py matti-rowe runs without error
userStories.notes: A-race info in profile.yaml, CTL in athlete_state.json

userStories.title: JSON Schema Validation
acceptanceCriteria: Create schemas/athlete_state.schema.json with JSON Schema
Schema validates all required fields in athlete_state.json
Create scripts/validate_state.py that validates against schema
Validation runs without error on current matti-rowe state
python3 scripts/validate_state.py matti-rowe runs without error

userStories.title: Unit Tests for Profile Manager
acceptanceCriteria: Create tests/test_profile_manager.py
Tests for load_profile, save_profile, update_state functions
Uses pytest framework
Creates temp files for testing, cleans up after
pytest tests/test_profile_manager.py passes

userStories.title: Intervals.icu Setup Documentation
acceptanceCriteria: Create docs/SETUP_INTERVALS.md
Step-by-step instructions to get Intervals.icu API key
How to find your athlete ID
How to configure .env
Example sync commands with expected output
Troubleshooting common errors
